title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 177.7 - Computation of instruction time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 177.7 - Computation of instruction time

State Regulations

To meet the minimum statutory requirement, attendance shall
be computed on the basis of an hour equaling 50 minutes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
177.7

Amended

New

York State Register January 4, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 01, eff. 1/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
